articles.title: Pound and euro 'unbuyable', says French bank - live updates - The Telegraph
articles.description: Britain’s fresh political crisis and the threat of Russia cutting off energy supplies to Europe have rendered the pound and the euro “unbuyable”, a top analyst has said.
articles.content:
